text: BACKGROUND : Adhesion molecule expression on the endothelial cell ( EC ) surface is critical for leukocyte recruitment to atherosclerotic lesions .
Better understanding of transcriptional regulation of adhesion molecules in ECs may provide important insight into plaque formation .
